attributes.action: Please award Cyril Rchard Rescorla, AKA Rick Rescorla a posthumous George Cross
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr Rescorla was born in Hayle, Cornwall in 1939, and after serving in the Parachute Regimen, he moved to the USA and joined the 7th Cavarly, where he saw action in Vietnam, wining several awards for bravery.

Later he became head of security at Morgan Stanley, based in the World Trade Centre, New York, where he implimented comprehensive fire/disaster evacuation proceedures for the staff, a full 10 years before the 9/11 disaster. As a result, when 9/11 happenned he saved, through his calm and commanding nature and control of the situation, 2,700 Morgan Stanley staff. When last seen, he was headed upwards again, in the south Tower, to help rescue those of other firms. Morgan Stanley only lost 6 people that day, mr Rescorla, and his five-man security team.

rejection.details: Decisions over bravery awards are taken by a special non-political committee.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
